text:
OM scheduling sets and accesses our own cookies on the domains operated by OM scheduling and its corporate affiliates.
OM scheduling uses cookies and similar technologies like single-pixel gifs and web beacons.

In addition, we use third party cookies, like Google Analytics.
We use both session-based and persistent cookies.
When you communicate with us via email we collect your email address.
We will share your personal data in the circumstances set out below: With law enforcement and regulatory bodies, or as required by law.

We process personal data in United States of America.
We will retain your Personal data for as long as needed or permitted in light of the purposes for which it was obtained and consistent with applicable law.
